Module: parsers/dicom

Dicom parser is a combination of utilities to get a VJS image from dicom files. scripts Relies on dcmjs, jquery, HTML5 fetch API, HTML5 promise API.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
arrayBuffer arraybuffer List of files to be parsed. It is urls from which VJS.parsers.dicom can pull the data from.

  • parsers/parsers.dicom.js, line 24

Methods

_swapFrame()

Swap bytes in frame.
